H0.text: Chloroplast is the cellular organelle that modifies fatty acids.

H1.text: The mitochondrion is the cellular organelle that modifies fatty acids.

H2.text: The Golgi complex is the cellular organelle that modifies fatty acids.

H3.text: Endoplasmic reticulum is the cellular organelle that modifies fatty acids.

A4.text: It synthesizes lipids, phospholipids, and steroids.

A5.text: The functions of the endoplasmic reticulum can be summarized as the synthesis and export of proteins and membrane lipids
